note:
Bio-ingenieur met motobotten en een brandweerhelm.
Adviseur gevaarlijke stoffen, ook verslaafd aan echt koken.

Bioscience engineer teaching all the fun bioscience parts at UAntwerp. If I do research, I mostly stick to microbiology.
Two wheels is perfect. If you see me on more, the truck will be red, with sirens and blue lights.
I moonlight as a hazardous materials advisor in the fire service. My love for cooking is totally unrelated.
